role.descr: more specific entity scanned, if in addition to ARG1

example.text: MRI of the pelvis identifying a rectal mass
example.amr: (i2 / identify-01 :ARG0 (m / mri-01 :ARG2 (a / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "pelvis"))) :ARG1 (s / sign-symptom :name (n2 / name :op1 "mass") :location (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n3 / name :op1 "rectum"))))
